description: The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
full_summary:
### Temporary Help Services for the National Capital Region

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Notice Title**: One (1) Senior Special Advisor - Temporary Help Services for the Department of National Defense (DND)

**Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defense (DND)

**Supplementary Attachment**: [link to tender notice and attachments](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4707/rfp-s4384520-english.pdf)

### Tender Information

* **Notice Publication Date**: April 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 13, 2023 at 16:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: April 12, 2023
* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Tender Status**: Cancelled
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Level of Security Requirement**: Top Secret

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defense (DND) requires temporary help services to support its operations in the National Capital Region (NCR). This requirement is open only to those suppliers who are qualified under the streams and categories listed under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR), specifically Stream 13 - Policy and Advisory Services - Special Advisor.

Suppliers who have been invited to submit a proposal are:

1.	12532778 CANADA Inc.
2.	ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
3.	Akkada Professional Services Inc.
4.	Cofomo Ottawa
5.	Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting, in Joint Venture
6.	DBHS Security Consulting Inc
7.	Excel Human Resources Inc.
8.	HubSpoke Inc.
9.	IBISKA Telecom Inc.
10.	Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
11.	Maverin Inc.
12.	MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
13.	Quarry Consulting Inc.
14.	TRM Technologies Inc.
15.	Turtle Island Staffing Inc.

Only top-secret resources will be accepted. Suppliers must submit their proposals in accordance with the requirements outlined in the tender notice and supplementary attachments. 

Please contact CFSG
